body: This pull request is targeted to solve #3846
Hi, sorry but could you please resolve the conflict first?

> Below are dependencies which I'm not sure if need fix:
> 
> * (JSR-000107 JCACHE 2.9 Public Review - Updated Specification License) JSR107 API and SPI (javax.cache:cache-api:1.0.0 - https://github.com/jsr107/jsr107spec)

Apache 2.0 License: OK

> * (GNU LESSER GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE, Version 2.1) SpotBugs Annotations (com.github.spotbugs:spotbugs-annotations:3.1.10 - https://spotbugs.github.io/)

LGPL: which is imcomplatible with Apache, I am investigating it.

> * (CC0 1.0 Universal License) Native Library Loader (org.scijava:native-lib-loader:2.0.2 - [http://github.com/scijava/native-lib-loader](https://github.com/scijava/native-lib-loader))

It is actually a [2-Clause BSD License](https://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php) , so I think it is ok.

I found some more reported by the script:

* (BEA licensed) "Java Concurrency in Practice" book annotations (net.jcip:jcip-annotations:1.0 - http://jcip.net/)

BEA license is said to be incompatible with Apache, need to investigate it.

* (Common Public License Version 1.0) JUnit (junit:junit:3.8.1 - http://junit.org)

CPL 1.0 is OK, but junit 3.8.1 should not be included, need to exclude it if possible.

* (The BSD License) Stax2 API (org.codehaus.woodstox:stax2-api:3.1.4 - http://wiki.fasterxml.com/WoodstoxStax2)

Standard BSD license is compatible with Apache.
*  (CPL) WSDL4J (wsdl4j:wsdl4j:1.6.3 - http://sf.net/projects/wsdl4j)

CPL is compatible with Apache.

My suggestion to improve the script is to add the following to `allowLicense`:
* Common Public License Version 1.0
* The 2-Clause BSD License

`dubbo` 中的 Magic Number 只是在`byte` 中标记协议的头,即协议的开始，同时使用 MAGIC_HIGH 和 MAGIC_LOW 进行校验，后续还有 head length, data length 等校验

而协议得的结尾是通过 data length 控制的，每次读取的数据总是 head + data length, 就算发生了粘包，
读取的数据依然是 head + data length 而多余数据会在下次解码时被读取。

可参考这个文章 [dubbo-codec2](https://github.com/web1992/read/blob/master/dubbo/dubbo-codec2.md)
Or `dubbo-common` depends `config-center-api`
